rounds.category: WHERE DID I LEAVE MY KEYS?

clues.text: Always check your pants pockets! Specifically, I'll check this style of tight-fitting pants named for an Italian island

rounds.text: The name of this country's national anthem translates as "His Majesty's Reign" & its lyrics come from a 1,000-year-old poem
